attributes.action: Allow UK citizens to watch non-BBC live TV channels without a TV license.
attributes.additional_details: It is wrong that anybody wanting to watch non-BBC live TV channels, should pay for a BBC TV licence. Only people who watch or listen to BBC content, should be required to have a TV licence.
attributes.background: The TV licence funds the BBC, therefore it should only be required for watching, or listening to BBC content.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567521
